column3: New Traffic Signals on W Main St at Broadway:
column4: New flashing yellow arrow signals have been installed on the right and left turn lanes.

column3: New Traffic Signals on W Main St at Broadway:
column4: These signals are intended to enhance pedestrian safety.
Wednesday March 13 thru Saturday March 16 at Rupp Arena.
Expect increased congestion if traveling downtown, use added caution, and watch for pedestrians.
